name: Lester's Tempo-Guided Dash
description:
A 6-level 2D platformer where each stage reacts to a fixed tempo. Heads up, though; it'll be smooth sailing in the beginning, but the difficulty of the game will spike as you draw near the end.

CREDITS:

Color palette: https://lospec.com/palette-list/twilight-5

Button prompts: https://thoseawesomeguys.com/prompts/

Everything else (including the music) by me :)
